website_summaries.verdict: Ready to tackle the trail less taken, the Salomon X Crest GTX hiking shoes feature the ruggedness of quality hiking boots in a much lightweight and low-cut package. It gets amazing feedback for being comfortable, supportive, and versatile. Even more impressive is the grippy outsole that works well on different surfaces. Too bad, this Gore-Tex shoe isn't available in wide variants.Overall, this shoe is a big hit, particularly for day hikers who are after waterproof, high-quality footwear that won't slow them down on the trail.
pros: A significant number of Salomon X Crest GTX reviews say that it is a very comfortable hiking shoe
Many people use these shoes not just for hiking but also for everyday activities
Several verified buyers have praised the Salomon X Crest GTX for being truly supportive
A handful of hikers also find it to be amazingly lightweight
The majority of reviewers say that the Salomon X Crest GTX hiking shoes deliver good traction on dirt, sand, and mud
Some say this lightweight hiking shoe fits like a glove
cons: A few customers find this shoe a bit narrow

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Salomon
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned a pair of Salomons but many of my friends rave about them, so I ordered a pair. The quality of this model is no where near what my friend's shoes were and considering they cost over $100, I'm returning them. Another small issue I also have this this model is that there is no 'loop' on the tongue for the laces to got thru, which prevents the tongue from sliding down or around... seems like that should be shoe design 101.
customer_reviews.author: boothtc

customer_reviews.title: Best hiking shoes you could ever buy
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are legit!!, i work overseas and there perfect especially because there made with goretex, it's been raining alot and I purposely walk in the water because it can't get through lol, also for testing to see if there actually waterproof... And they are.. The tread is perfect for all the gravel, mud and dirt... The most surprising feature about these shoes is that they are ridiculously light weight.... I'm probably gonna buy a second pair just to have for back up, there worth the price and worth having 2 pairs... So far the best hiking shoes I have worn... Hands down..
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Don't count of the waterproof lining!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fit of these shoes, but I wore them recently in a heavy rain and they did not keep my feet dry. I was also disappointed by how quickly the rubber sole wore away.
customer_reviews.author: jrak

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a 30 mile hike
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a 3 day, 30 mile hike I recently took. Subjected them to some pretty rough terrain, like Lava Rock and shale. These shoes stood up to the test. Very well made and comfortable. If you're hiking in the summer and don't want the extra weight of a hiking boot I recommend these. Very solid hikers!
customer_reviews.author: John Xcel

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC SHOE
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pair of Salomons I have ever had. So far, they are perfect. They run small though. I normally take a size 12 but they were way too small. Really comfortable. Hope they can handle a little mositure and are durable but right now I love them.
customer_reviews.author: raybo

customer_reviews.title: Well made comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. First lasted over five years.I work for the forestry. Walk on everything, I can hardly tell I have shoes on. They mold to your feet. Love it. Water resistant too. Breathe Nice. Great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Please offer them in an E Width
customer_reviews.text: I normally where width E these were just a bit too narrow for my feet length was good.
customer_reviews.author: GusBros

customer_reviews.title: They hurt us feet
customer_reviews.text: After wearing the shoes a handful of times, the shoes hurt my husbands feet and puts blisters on them. They didn’t initially do this. My husband is not satisfied at all.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: best shoes ive bought
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 pairs they fit and feel so good . great for hiking hours on end .
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased other brands of waterproof hiking shoes and found them to be very hot. These are comfortable and I've worn them on rainy, wet days trekking through wet grass and puddles and they've kept my feet dry. I'm very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kassidy McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe feels great! It has good support and fit. I have had other more expensive Saloman's and they didn't feel as good as these. I can't speak to durability yet but they seem to be typical Saloman's high quality.
customer_reviews.author: John Gentz

customer_reviews.title: well made shoes
customer_reviews.text: this shoes are really nice, and I used many many times hinking the mountain and they look like new. I recommend it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Navas

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my father because his orthotics wouldn't fit in a narrower shoe. He has commented several times that they fit great & feel great walking. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Weimer

customer_reviews.title: Everything was perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and quality as usual. Shipment on time and size appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Verónica

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit and sole has plenty of traction. Has enough water proofing to keep you dry unless you get submerged, but also not too much water proofing to make your feet hot.
customer_reviews.author: christopher prater

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! But let your feet adjust
customer_reviews.text: The foot bed is cupped slightly, which provides excellent stability for this type of shoe. But you may want to allow your foot to get used to it before wearing them on a long trek.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Great for hiking
customer_reviews.text: It's my 2nd pair of Salomon hiking shoes - highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Olga Neimark

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: Just hiked the Grand Canyon, Kaibab to Bright Angel. Awesome shoes! Durable tough shoes well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: blue devil

customer_reviews.title: I don't think you would go wrong with these shoes are excellent
customer_reviews.text: They absolutely fit my foot like a glove very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Arch support is good.
customer_reviews.text: My immediate impression was this shoe felt supportive and provided a firm comfortable feel while walking. In particular, my feet were stable, not moving around in the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for hiking!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive buying from Amazon, but these worked perfectly up a few 14ers without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Rey

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes just extremely tight with no option for wide
customer_reviews.text: Extremely tight shoes and because of the water proof seal the shoe can’t expand to give more room.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A Batchelder

customer_reviews.title: Salomon makes a great product
customer_reviews.text: Basically have 8 pairs of different salomon shoes and boots of different kinds. Empresses with it all. I wear a size 12 normally. But 13 in salomon. Always oder up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Sh5blood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove. I have relatively narrow feet and an arch (not flat footed). These shoes fit as well as the $200+ Lowa I've had in the past. Lightweight and sturdy too! I'm a convert.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: So far the products been great. I really like the grip and how it feels out in the dirt and trails. I would have given it hirer durability marks but the shoelaces are already fraying looks like they’re going to break after only 1 month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn Salomon shoes for a while now and I’ve always worn a size 12. These run about a half size small but unfortunately they don’t offer a 12.5. Other than the size I love the shoes. Just sucks I’m out $120.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hamlett

customer_reviews.title: I’ll buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. The non slip bottom makes a noticeable difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this shoe! Sadly not available in a wide version.
customer_reviews.text: Would give anything to get one of several versions of Salomon shoes. They are perfect but not available in wide sizes. My loss AND Salomons loss of business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: Wear an 11 and these ran small ( 10 or 10 1/2). Looked nice but were uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are good shoes for walking and running through the woods. Fit is good and it is not too narrow. Good support.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Garcia

product_meta.title: SALOMON Men's X Crest GTX Hiking
product_meta.description: When you explore beyond the trailhead, it's nice to have the confidence of x crest gtx. With a stable, cushioned midsole, an aggressive sole pattern, and protective toe and heel, you'll be ready to take your adventure beyond the beaten path. And a full gore-tex membrane offers complete weather protection.
feature_bullets: Instant comfort: A cushioned, stable fit based on the proven X-Ultra will feel great from the first step to the last mile
Durability: A durable upper with PU coated leather reinforcement, stands up to the most rugged terrain and wear
Protection: protective Toe cap and heel counter, and reinforcement around the foot, offer protection from rocks and sticks. Full GORE-TEX membrane offers complete waterproofness
